select count(*) from freeboard WHERE ${searchType} LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'

SELECT fb.*, m.mem_name as mem_name FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, fb.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM freeboard fb WHERE (${searchType} LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%') AND (closed_chk = 'N') ORDER BY board_category, board_idx DESC ) fb JOIN member m ON fb.mem_id = m.mem_id WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageStart} + #{perPageNum} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{pageStart} + 1

SELECT FB.*, COUNT(R.board_idx) AS count, MAX(FB.closed_chk) AS closed_chk FROM freeboard FB LEFT JOIN report R ON FB.board_idx = R.board_idx WHERE FB.board_idx = #{board_idx} GROUP BY FB.board_idx, FB.board_category, FB.mem_id, FB.board_title, FB.board_contents, FB.board_file, FB.board_visitcount, FB.board_postdate, FB.closed_chk
